content.introduction:
I'm a self-taught full-stack engineer with a passion for clean and stable code.
As an <1><2>Adventurer, always curious about new technologies and willing to share.
Additionally, I excel at creating harmonious environments by recognizing and understanding the emotions of those around me.
content.backendDetails: Two years and one year of experience with <0>NodeJS/Express</0> and <1>Python/FastAPI</1> respectively. Almost use SQL-like databases, utilize indexes frequently to speed up query efficiency, and also used <2>Firebase</2> for chat room development. Apply <3>cheerio</3> to crawl  live scores of games information.
content.frontendDetails: I've experience in ReactJS for 1 year. Make good use of <0>Redux Toolkit</0> to centrally manage the state and cooperate with <1>RTK Query</1> to simplify the code for loading API data. And I'm used to using Typescript for JS development. Has the basic ability of HTML/CSS, often used <2>styled-component</2> to develop component.
content.devOpsDetails: More familiar with AWS cloud services, used with <0>EC2</0>, <1>S3</1>, <2>RDS</2>, etc., and set up <3>CodeDeploy</3> to automatically deploy code. Apply <4>GCE</4> to manage virtual machines and scheduling, and cooperate with <5>PM2</5> to manage multiple NodeJS processes. Utilize <6>Docker-Compose</6> to build backend and frontend services.

tasks: Built UI with Ant Design, Material UI, and ag-grid-angular, using NgRx for state management to centralize workflow and enhance data visualization
Developed a JSON/code editor with Monaco Editor to replace manual Postman operations and improve efficiency
Implemented advanced workflow control with search by name, fab., and time range, plus batch actions for re-execution, pause, and termination
Enhanced user experience with validation features like naming rules, change-detection saving, and readable cron expressions to prevent errors
By integrating Bearer Token authentication, IT/ECIM teams can define, schedule, and manage workflows with verified identities, while logging operations for tracking
Integrated interactive d3.js visualizations enabling users to view, drag, zoom, and interact with workflow graphs for quick process understanding
subTasks: With full-stack development experience enables designing flexible API specifications and documenting them to reduce communication costs
Developed an automation system that reduced process status data collection time from one week to under one day, cutting 80% of the IT department's manual workload
Developed an interface for users to upload data via Excel, with built-in validation to ensure correct process status data collection
Proactively refined UI/UX based on ambiguous feedback from ECIM/PM/IT, focusing on details to enhance usability and meet user needs
Mainly using Angular for frontend development with NgRx state management, while maintaining the backend to ensure system stability and maintainability

milestone.subTask: Data Engineering and Labeling Technology Applications.
tasks: Solely responsible for the front-end logic of all pages
Self-learning and independent development with React and <1>Typescript</1> at a tight deadline
Effectively communicate with the backend and adjust the APIs based on previous backend experience
Using <1>Ant Design</1> for React UI library or custom component
Using <1>Redux Toolkit</1> for centralizing state management and simplifying many common use cases, like creating Reducer
Optimizing API requests with <1>Redux Toolkit Query</1> elevates user experience
Passed all vulnerability scans which saved the company hundreds of thousands of NT dollars and no issues were found on <1>SonarQube</1>
Currently responsible for researching and implementing frontend technologies, as well as taking on teaching and execution responsibilities. Skilled in establishing file structures and code style.
subTasks: Familiar with search API with multiple queries based on <1>RESTful</1> designed, like aggregate function, having clause
Implement the concept of microservices by <1>Docker-Compose</1> , each project communicates via API gateway
Connect Google OAuth 2.0 API for third-party login and <1>JWT</1> token for native login
Using <1>Alembic</1> toolkit for auto-generating database migrations
Realize the rollback of multiple data creation by <1>Redis</1>

milestone.mainTask: A platform that provides sports lottery analysis and predictions.
tasks: Import <1>AJV</1> validation for input and redesign the project structure
Chat room development with firebase realtime database
Stable and clean code writing for APIs and scheduling
Recovery other senior engineers error and refactor code
Built engineering mindset and problem-solving skills through 1000+ hours of immersive training and completed the backend project «Lover Never Stray»
Enhanced communication skill through collaboration with Front-End and iOS members on «Stylish»
Adopted Agile and Scrum Methodology on the personal project development to deliver features on time
Wrote a paper based on Machine Learning for computer-aided diagnosis and prepared the submission to international journals
Adjusted deep learning models and parameters with Python
Established x-ray labeling system for doctors
Main courses: «Machine Learning», «Image Processing»

Published thesis «Developing a novel cancer scoring card method for predicting metastasis of colorectal cancer from lymph node biopsy», used the Genetic algorithm combined with the Taguchi method which can quantify the degree of lymph node metastasis of colorectal cancer.
Using JAVA to develop jigsaw puzzles for Android phones
Developed the bee and Rockman games in C# language with Unity, learned game design concepts such as scenes, cameras, etc.
The Phi Tau Phi Scholastic Honor Society Honorary member
Academic Excellence Award (top 5% of class in semester) four times

projects.name: Pet Adoption
projects.summary: Integrated nationwide pet data from shelters, offering clear categories and filters for users to quickly browse different types of pets, with links to the government animal shelter management system. (LNS Project 4.0)
tech: Developed with Next.js to create a fast, scalable React app with SSR and SSG capabilities for better performance
Deployed via Vercel with version tracking using deployment dates

projects.name: Never Stray
projects.summary: Animal adoption platform in Taiwan with shelter integration and meet map. Users can easily find pets using various search filters or keep track of pets they're interested in. (LNS Project 3.0)
tech: Use Redux Toolkit for centralizing state management and simplifying many common use cases like creating reducer
Eliminate the need to hand-write data fetching and caching logic yourself by using RTK Query

projects.name: Dotted Sign
projects.summary: I participated in an interactive web design competition hosted by HexSchool and created a simple web-based signature service. My submission was selected as a finalist.
tech: Provide multiple login/register options, including using native, Google, or Facebook accounts
Support uploading images or PDF files as background for signature
Provide interactive operations such as dragging, zooming in/out, etc. for signature when signing documents

projects.name: Emblems
projects.summary: Provide various filters for players to search for boost emblems and a calculator tool for calculating the effects of the emblems on their Pokemon, suitable for Pokemon game players to reference.
tech: Adopt react-i18n to support Chinese/English language
Use Vite to improve development speed
Apply Tailwind CSS for webpage styling
Utilize MUI component library as the design foundation to simplify webpage design

projects.name: ChatTalker
projects.summary: To improve my HTML and CSS skills, I joined a frontend course from HexSchool, according to design draft, writing HTML, SCSS, and JQuery code only, and providing responsive web design.
tech: Based on the SMACSS concept to design CSS modular architecture
Learn how to read Figma or Adobe XD design drafts
